TEXT.S: Doug Bolstorff sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1931, ryax sa tay 29 nqu tay 10, Doug Bolstorff, squliq na p'unro. krahu' pqwasan biru, Doug Bolstorff mzyu mari maki Minnesota. 1957 kawas, te spat NBA pspung tmwang Draft. 1957 1958 kawas, cyugal pspung mzyu mari maki NBA. F.Doug Bolstorff raral mtzyaw na sinsiy,2001 kawas,cyux mhngaw la.
